summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Mercer Street from Fairview Avenue to Westlake Avenue et al, in the City of Seattle, by grading & regrading under Ordinance No. 17153, creating Local Improvement District No. 1600 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
